name: Empty Desert (Wagon Road)
description: A cracked and uneven stretch of dusty wagon road, showing signs of relentless sun and neglect. The path here is faint and rutted, a mere suggestion of passage across the vast, indifferent desert. The wagon road continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the endless expanse of the undeveloped frontier. The air is still, thick with dust and the scent of dry sagebrush, broken only by the distant cry of a hawk, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
